item.title: Dorothea Salo on "What are some examples of digital libraries that use MIX metadata for images?"
item.dc:creator: Dorothea Salo
item.description: This article about the NDNP program might get you started; presumably the LoC's partners are all using MIX.

item.title: cps138 on "What are some examples of digital libraries that use MIX metadata for images?"
item.dc:creator: cps138
item.description:
I'm looking for examples of digital libraries that use LOC's MIX (metadata for images in XML) for technical metadata in their collections. I wanted to see example records of MIX in use. Because it is technical metadata I was having a hard time finding examples of its use. I am writing a research paper about MIX, and wondered about any troubles in implemenetation of the MIX schema, any issues with the MIX elements, and any other information about MIX. Thank you for anyone who can help.

Caleb Sheaffer
cps22@pitt.edu
